rows.label: qst702404_msg0001
rows.name:
It's you all! It's been a
while. How have you been?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0002
rows.name: Hm? Why am I in the capital?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I'm what you'd call a
rolling stone, traveling the
world in search of treasure.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0004
rows.name:
But even a rolling stone
needs a base of operations
to start their adventures.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0005
rows.name:
So right now, I'm in the middle
of looking for that base.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0006
rows.name:
What? In that case, why
not join the resistance?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0007
rows.name:
Hahaha! You're kidding, right?
I'm not the military type!

rows.label: qst702404_msg0009
rows.name:
Rather than traveling the world for
treasure, staying in one place to protect
something precious isn't so bad either.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0010
rows.name:
...This seems to be a
big decision for me.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0011
rows.name:
Sorry, but could you give me
some time to think about it?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0012
rows.name:
It's alright. I know where
the resistance camp is.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0013
rows.name:
If I decide to take you up on your
offer, I'll head over there.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0014
rows.name:
But if I don't show up,
then that's your answer.

rows.label: qst702404_msg0101
rows.name:
Sorry, but could you give me
some time to think about it?

rows.label: qst702404_msg0102
rows.name:
If I decide to join the
resistance, I'll make sure
to visit the resistance camp.
